items.preText: 5.53pm We're all set for the chase. Tamim Iqbal and Soumya Sarkar are striding out to begin Bangladesh's chase. West Indies will start with spin. Ashley Nurse from round the wicket, with two left-handers at the crease. A slip in place.
items.text: full, angling into leg stump, clipped to short fine leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, makes a bit of room and slashes to backward point
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: makes plenty of room before the bowler delivers, and receives a back-of-a-length ball on off stump. He's created room to free his arms, and he does just that to lift it effortlessly over the covers. Top shot
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: looks to deny him room this time, and ends up sliding a full one down the leg side, past the attempted sweep
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: full on middle stump, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full on off stump, and he drives inside-out, into the gap to the right of mid-off
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.preText: No slip now. A short extra-cover is in place instead, plugging the big gap that the ball just went through.
items.text: flat length ball on off stump, can't make enough room to really give this a proper slap. Stabs it to the man at cover point
items.shortText: Nurse to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText:
Jason Holder from over the wicket. A wide slip in place.

So the three Powerplays will be overs 1-5 with two on the rope, then 6-19 with four men out on the boundary, and 20-24 with five on the boundary.
items.text: poor ball, back of a length and on the pads, and the man at short fine leg does extremely well with a full-length dive to his right to cut off Tamim's flick
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short over middle and off, Soumya stays leg-side of the ball while attempting to hook from over his shoulder, cannot connect
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: full, slanting away into a sixth-stump line. Reaches out to drive but can't connect, and it's called wide
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, 1 wide

items.text: shortish, straightens towards leg stump to tuck Soumya up for room. Jabs it away to backward point
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: edged, and it's wide of the keeper! Shortish, angling away from off stump. Not too much room, and I think he was trying to dab it past the wide slip, ended up edging it much finer than intended, past the left glove of the diving keeper
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: excellent bouncer, rising steeply over leg stump, and Soumya falls over backwards, literally, to evade it. Did well to keep his eye on the ball though
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: length ball angling away from off stump, and the previous ball slowed down Soumya's front-foot movement to this one. A little late coming forward to push into the point region, and the ball slides past his open bat face
items.shortText: Holder to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Kemar Roach now, from right-arm round. A wide slip in place for him too.
items.text: back of a length on off stump, tucked away with soft hands through square leg, and the man has to come in a long way off the boundary so they can run two
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: sharp short ball creates the chance, and Ashley Nurse puts down a dolly! It's up at shoulder height and he's caught between pulling and fending, and in the end he sends it ballooning up towards short third man. Nurse gets right under it, gets both hands to it, and puts it down
items.shortText: Roach to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: bang. Full on middle stump, and he clears his front leg and launches it cleanly over the wide long-on boundary
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: different length, similar region, four more. Back of a length, on middle and leg, and he clears his front leg and swats it away over midwicket
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on off stump, and he pulls fiercely again, can't beat the man at midwicket
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of a length, lots of width, cracked away past the tumbling fielder at backward point. Was that a misfield?
items.shortText: Roach to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.preText: Can Shannon Gabriel slow down Bangladesh and Soumya? Over the wicket.
items.text: back of a length on off stump, nudged away quietly through midwicket to bring Soumya back on strike
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Davo: "Since the start of the WI-Eng ODI series i think Nurse has put down about 50 catches, with 49 being straightforward!"
items.text: shot! Soumya's batting on another planet here. Short, angling away from off stump, gets up to chest height, and he picks the length so quickly, he's able to meet it well in front of his body with a full extension of his arms, and pull it all the way over the square midwicket boundary
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, SIX runs

items.text: shortish on off stump, lets it come on and uses the pace to guide it down to third man
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: length ball close to off stump, jumps across and dabs gently into the covers
items.shortText: Gabriel to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: what a brilliant shot that is! Length ball angling across into a fifth-stump line, and Soumya takes a big step back and across, head nice and still right through, and then flicks it away to the right of the short fine leg fielder
items.shortText: Gabriel to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs
